scripts.lint: npm run lint:backend && npm run lint:frontend
scripts.lint:backend:all: npm run lint:backend:main && npm run lint:backend:assistant && npm run lint:backend:auth && npm run lint:backend:health && npm run lint:backend:metrics && npm run lint:backend:notifications
scripts.lint:backend:main: cd backend && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:backend:assistant: cd assistant-service && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:backend:auth: cd auth-service && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:backend:health: cd health-service && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:backend:metrics: cd metrics-service && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:backend:notifications: cd notification-service && black --check app/ tests/ && isort --check-only app/ tests/ && flake8 app/ tests/
scripts.lint:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint && npm run format:check
scripts.format: npm run format:backend && npm run format:frontend
scripts.format:backend:all: npm run format:backend:main && npm run format:backend:assistant && npm run format:backend:auth && npm run format:backend:health && npm run format:backend:metrics && npm run format:backend:notifications
scripts.format:backend:main: cd backend && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:backend:assistant: cd assistant-service && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:backend:auth: cd auth-service && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:backend:health: cd health-service && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:backend:metrics: cd metrics-service && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:backend:notifications: cd notification-service && black app/ tests/ && isort app/ tests/
scripts.format:frontend: cd frontend && npm run lint:fix && npm run format
